ComicInfo.Summary: Aftermath [Part 2]: As L'Rell and the Klingons arrive to discuss peace with the Federation, Spock questions his role in Starfleet. The conference is interrupted by the arrival of Klingon rebels determined to overthrow L'Rell as leader of the Klingon Empire.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-24 23:55:09. [CVDB719971] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-09 14:32:41. [Issue ID 2017612]
ComicInfo.Characters: unnamed Enterprise officers,Chancellor L'Rell,Michael Burnham (flashback),unnamed Starfleet diplomats,Captain Christopher Pike,Kor,the Shadows of Kahless (Klingon rebels),Number One [Una],Spock,unnamed Klingons,Admiral Shallek (Andorian)
ComicInfo.Title: Aftermath [Part 2]
